## MapView.setFovCalculation() method

Set's the way in which the fov is calculated on the map view. Note, for this to take visual effect, the map should be rendered after calling this function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setFovCalculation(fovCalculation: FovCalculation): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fovCalculation | [FovCalculation](./harp-mapview.fovcalculation.md) | How the FOV is calculated. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
